title: Huawei launches Watch GT 3 Pro series with ECG in China
content:
Earlier today, Huawei announced its latest foldable phone, the Mate Xs 2. Along with a new smartphone, the firm also announced two new wearables, the Huawei Watch GT 3 Pro and the Huawei Band 7. We will be focusing on the former here as there is a lot to unpack, so let’s get started. The

The post Huawei launches Watch GT 3 Pro series with ECG in China appeared first on XDA.
description: Huawei launched its latest smartwatch, theÂ Watch GT 3 Pro. As a premium offering, it utilzes materials like ceramic, titanium, and sapphire.
